name: Binah Advisory
overview: Binah Advisory is made up of a very specialized network of highly skilled consultants who are veterans in their field. From Lean Six Sigma Operations experts and Executive Coaching experts, to Corporate Psychologists; from Customer Service and Sales experts, to Board of Directors and Start Up Executives. Founded by Tullio Siragusa, a 20 years veteran of the Media (Search, Publishing, Web/Mobile and Social Networks), Software (Products and Services), Consulting (IT, M&A, Professional Services), and Telecommunication (Data and Voice) industries. Binah Advisory helps Entrepreneurs, Senior Executives and Organizations become more effective in their respective markets, gain a competitive advantage, improve return on investments (ROI), and improve time and organizational management by as much as 63%; allowing for more creativity and business innovation. Tullio Siragusa is an expert in process and work flow optimization solutions for sales, marketing and operations. Past advisory clients include: Viacom, Disney, NBC Universal, MSN, Facebook, JP Morgan Chase, Citigroup, Bank of America, Dow Jones, Zurich Financial, McKinsey & Co, and GE. Advisory provided to the executive suite, and divisional management level. Tullio Siragusa is also well versed in NeoThinking; a society member of some of the most forward thinkers in the world. Tullio Siragusa’s background includes: Co-Founder, Director and CEO of M3 Mobile Ltd - UK, a self publishing social media platform on web and mobile for entrepreneurs and social scene makers; CEO of SEM/SEO expert Ansearch Ltd. (publicly traded on ASX); Senior Global Vice President of Operative Media (Edison Venture Fund); and Director and Partner roles with Softtek / Ernst & Young, Computer Sciences Corporation and PricewaterhouseCoopers.
